description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, teal & olive warp. Dark blue & green, metallic blue weft.  Plain weave variation. Stapled to 8.5x11\" card with 99.1.1213.10, 12, 13.  \"H-8B\" written on card.  Some notes on reverse. (blue, green)
title: Lapis Development Sample
